about_the_game:
Far away from home, sailing through unknown waters. I ask the Gods to show me mercy.
My family, my people. Consumed by the tongues of fire. I never should have left them.
There may still be hope. They may still be, somewhere…
Only she can help me find the way… the way home.
Gods give me strength, the strength to regain what I lost.

Ashes Of Idunn: Tales Of Fimbulwinter is a sneak peek into the future of the Ashes Of Idunn Metaverse.
In this experience, you will follow the Berserker into battle in search of his people. After the fight with the Troll, the Berserker seeks the Voelver to get answers.


The world of Tales Of Fimbulwinter is vast and offers different types of animal life and vegetation.
You can choose to explore the world freely but beware, some enemies might be camping around the corner.


Enemies will try to stop your search. Thankfully, with the power of the Gods and your mighty axe, you can defeat them in old-fashioned melee combat
But be careful, too many enemies at once may cause your demise.


Low on health? With some mix of natural ingredients found in the world and a little rest at the resting runes that will not be a problem for long.
These magical runes have the power of giving great comfort to our Berserker, this way, he is able to rest and regain his strength.


The path may seem straightforward, but sometimes even the greatest need a guide. The runes will serve as a guide for your travels within this realm.
Just follow the runes and you will eventually find your way to the Voelver and your people.

Had fun with the experience and need more Ashes of Idunn? Do not fret, there is more to come...

content_descriptors.notes: Violence and combat with blood are present in-game.

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080 or AMD RX 7800 XT
